message.entry: visadevlist, visadevfind, and visadev are not supported on Linux.
Timeout must be greater than or equal to 2.
Unable to find any VISA resources during the default timeout period of {0} seconds. Specify a larger "Timeout" value or open the vendor's control software to search for available VISA resources.
Unable to set the timeout value to {0}. Setting timeout to {1} instead.
Unable to find any VISA resources during the specified timeout period. Open the vendor's control software to search for available VISA resources.
Unable to find VISA installations. Open the Support Package Installer to install VISA.
Unable to find any enabled VISA installations. Open the vendor's control software and enable an installation using the Conflict Manager.
Unable to find any resources during the specified timeout period.
Timeout expired while searching for available resources.
Resource string is invalid or resource was not found.
Combined hardware and software control is not supported. Supported flow control modes are "none", "software", and "hardware".
The VISA library is unable to access this resource because it is already in use.
The VISA library is unable to access this resource.
Saving VISA resource objects to a MAT-file is not supported.
Loading VISA resource objects from a MAT-file is not supported.
The value of {0} property was set to {1} because this device does not support setting it to {2}.
Creating a second device for the {0} resource is not supported.
The specified terminator was not read before the timeout period expired.
Multiple VISA installations are available. To use one of them, select NI VISA or RS VISA.
This preference is only used on macOS. For other platforms, set the preferred VISA using the vendor's control software.
{0} is not a supported VISA vendor on macOS. Valid vendor settings include "NI" and "RS".
Unable to determine status for {0} resource in the current configuration.
The preferred VISA on macOS is set to "NI".
The preferred VISA on macOS is set to "RS".
The {0} property is no longer supported for visadev objects.
The {0} method is no longer supported for visadev objects.
Failed to read data from the instrument due to a driver error.
Method visadevWorkaroundForBugReport2495604 is only supported in MATLAB versions R2021a (starting in update 6) and R2021b (starting in update 3). Use visadev instead.
Value must be true, false, or a string array of resource names and identification commands.
Invalid resource name {0}.
Expected a logical or an N-by-2 string array, where each row contains a resource name and its corresponding identification command.
Repeated resource name {0}. Ensure all resource names are unique.
Resource {0} is not identified. Specify a valid identification command.
Provided type ''{0}'' does not match desired resource type ''{1}''.
Data being written must be a row vector of uint8 data.
This device does not support the specified attribute value.
Unable to set this attribute because this value puts the instrument in an invalid state.
Timeout expired before the operation completed.
Unknown VISA system error has occurred. Clear visadev object and verify that connection is still valid before creating object again.
Invalid command ''{0}''.
Unable to fully execute command ''{0}''.
Adaptor command ''{0}'' failed with status code: {1}.
Method ''{0}'' requires an ''options'' structure containing a field ''{1}'' of type ''{2}''.
Internal error: code for the ''{0}'' platform should not run on a ''{1}'' platform.
Internal error: plugin can only run in ''{0}'' mode.
Adaptor command ''{0}'' only valid in "Normal" mode.
Unable to create or open a session for the default resource manager.
Invalid expression specified for search.
Unable to determine preferred VISA.

Failed to load the ''{0}'' shared library file (error code: {1}). The ''init'' method must have an ''options'' structure with a field ''ConflictManagerPath'' of type ''char'' pointing to the location of the conflict manager shared library.
Unable to find entry point ''{0}'' in conflict manager shared library.
Unable to initialize shared library.
Currently configured VISA installation is unable to handle the specified resource. Open the vendor's control software to make sure that a preferred VISA is set and enabled.
Unable to get VISA installation count from shared library.
Unable to get VISA installation information from the shared library because no preferred VISA was found. Open the vendor's control software to set and enable the preferred VISA.
Unable to load conflict manager or establish entry points.
Unable to load conflict manager or establish entry points on macOS.
Unhandled exception caught while calling conflict manager method ''{0}''.\n{1}
